ooC: Ahhh! Azure's no-post session kinda messed me up as far as 
posting goes. Other than that, I've been helping my best friends 
move into their new appartment for the last few days. We finished 
most stuff yesterday night. (and proceeded to LAN =p) I read all of 
the posts that happened since I left so I'm pretty much caught up. 
(I personally don't like asking the group for a recap, better that I 
do it myself.) =)

Would anyone mind if I had Switchblade trigger the artifact, and 
make a laser like beam come out of it, slashing a hole through the 
side of the Predacon base, and slicing by Owlhawk, Megatron, Tyrael, 
(and some others?)

-- Megatron --

Megatron's energon axe was poised to come down on Tyrael as 
Owlhawk's plasma cannon flared out of know where, smashing into his 
shoulder, knocking him to the ground. 

"Ahh yes..." says Megatron to himself as he gets up, "It seems this 
Maximal has Predacon tendancies. That was a brillian backstab." He 
winces as his checks the damage to his left arm. Still functional.

"In that case, I'd be flattered to play with him." Megatron's 
weapons phase out of subspace and the target Owlhawk. He immediately 
launches a rocket, followed by two plasma blasts.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Owlhawk finally arrives at the Pred base.  He transforms in the 
air 
> and fires his plasma canon at Megatron.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> > ::Rodimus Prime::
> > 
> > "Ok, Blackfang, we are going to attack the Predacon base. I hope 
> you are prepared!"
> > 
> > He continues on.
